General.Name: Anhui Shenjian New Materials Co Ltd
General.Description: Anhui Shenjian New Materials Co.,Ltd researches, produces, markets, and sells saturated polyester resins for powder coatings in chemical materials field in China and internationally. The company offers outdoor polyester resins primarily used in the surface field of outdoor metal equipment, including home appliances, building materials, automobiles, agricultural machinery, construction machinery, 5G base stations, high-speed guardrails and general Industrial, etc.; and hybrid polyester resin for use in the surface field of indoor metal equipment, including home appliances, building materials, home furnishing, medical equipment and electronic 3C products, etc. It also provides epoxy resin, TGIC curing agent, leveling agent, and brighteners. The company was founded in 1988 and is based in Wuhu, China.
